{{Quote|Echiel, to the Builders.|Lord Commander Jeor Mormont|You Win or You Die}}

'''Echiel''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made Builder of the Night's Watch, of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no member of the Night's Watch called Echiel.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Echiel is present during the speech Lord Commander [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. He is assigned to the Builders.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
